alert.note: Alert for Grimes; Houston; Madison; Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 9:42PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Trinity, southeastern Grimes, northwestern Montgomery, northwestern San Jacinto, southern Houston, east central Madison, northeastern Waller, west central Polk and Walker Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 942 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montgomery, or 12 miles west of Willis, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Huntsville, Willis, Pinehurst, The Woodlands, Trinity, Panorama Village, Magnolia, New Waverly, Point Blank, Montgomery, Riverside, Todd Mission, Sebastopol, Huntsville State Park, Lake Conroe Dam, Crabbs Prairie, Dobbin, Oakhurst and Dacus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Grimes; Houston; Madison; Montgomery; Polk; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker; Waller
